MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a damaged underground cable in Neilsland Street affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:00pm on Monday, 11th January 2021.
